page.title: 13MINSTERLEY CHURCH BRIGADE
page.content: The Church Lads and Girls Brigade meets every Thursday evening at the Parish Hall. Our uniform is a blue dress or skirt and blouse with a white sash which we wear on parade nights.The boys wear navy blue trousers and a red belt.The groups are called "Corps." We have drill, play games and have a band with drums and bugles. We can earn badges for learning about things like fire fighting, the church,swimming and recruitment. Sometimes we go away for weekend camps.At camp we do all kinds of really exciting things like canoeing, orienteering,caving and rambling.
